name: Parasite Zombie
description:
Parasite Zombie is a 3D singleplayer platformer game originated during a short Gamejam with the theme "I see you".

Solve this puzzle game by using the zombies as hosts to move forward. Zombies stand still if they are not inherited by you and move automatically if so. When you have vision of a zombie just click on it and be a good parasite. hf xx
